title: Global market share held by PC vendors 2019
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Share of shipments in each Brand on the y axis.
The Share of shipments is highest at Brand Lenovo and lowest at Brand Asus.
The highest Brand Lenovo has 18.6 more Share of shipments than the lowest Brand Asus.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of shipments for 7 number of Brands.
The Share of shipments is highest at Brand Lenovo and lowest at Brand Asus.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Share of shipments in each Brand on the y axis.
The Share of shipments is highest at Brand Lenovo and lowest at Brand Asus.
The highest Brand Lenovo has 18.6 more Share of shipments than the lowest Brand Asus.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Share of shipments in the y axis.
The maximum Share of shipments 24.1 is found at Brand Lenovo and the minimum is found at Asus where Brand is 5.5.
The second highest Share of shipments is appeared to be the Brand HP Inc.
The highest Brand Lenovo has 18.6 more Share of shipments than the lowest Brand Asus.
Brand Lenovo is higher than any other Brands with value 24.1, followed by HP Inc, and Others. Down to Brand Asus with the lowest value 5.5.
The average Share of shipments in all 7 Brands is 14.29.
